document_data.name: ''Staff of the Winds''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''staff of the winds''''' was a magical item that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|52-53}}{{Cite dragon/179/Wonders of the Land of Fate}}
document_data.Description: These magical items were available in a wide variety.
document_data.Powers:
These staves granted to following powers to a wizard at the expense of one charge: ''[[alter normal winds]]'', ''[[flying jambiya]]'', ''[[solid fog]]'', ''[[wind blade]]'', and ''[[ wind wall]]''.

The following powers consumed two charges for regular wizards and only one charge for [[Elemental mage|wind mages]]: ''[[conjure air elemental]]'', ''[[cloudkill]]'', ''[[wind carpet]]'', and ''[[summon wind dragons]]''.

Wind mages gained exclusive access to the ''[[windtomb]]'' power at the expense of four charges.

Any mage holding the staff gained the advantage of the ''[[feather fall]]'' spell so long as they maintained contact with the staff.
